YUIDoc Class

Defined in: lib/yuidoc.js:50
Module: yuidoc

YUIDoc main class

   var options = {
       paths: [ './lib' ],
       outdir: './out'
   };

   var Y = require('yuidoc');
   var json = (new Y.YUIDoc(options)).run();
